name: Feint Defender
text: You use your shield to conceal your own body language and keep your attention focused.
prerequisites: Shield Focus, base attack bonus +6 or fighter level 4th, Sense Motive 1 rank.
benefit: You add your shield’s bonus to AC to the DC of feint attempts against you.
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points to force a foe to attempt two Bluff checks when trying to feint against you in combat, and use the lower of the two results. (See page 18.)
text_zh: 你使用你的盾牌来遮蔽你的肢体语言并使自己集中注意力。
prerequisites_zh: 盾牌专攻，BAB+6或者战士4级，察言观色1级。
benefit_zh: 将盾牌的AC加值加到敌人对你虚招的DC上。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗5点耐力来迫使一名对手在对你尝试虚招时做出两次唬骗检定，并使用较低的结果。
